text:
Not sure where this fits, so I'll post it here.

I have a newsletter running but each and every one of its edition keeps getting into promotions. This has been affecting my open rates and further the click rates as well.

At first, I thought it was due to the links (since I do link some articles, podcasts and websites), however, I sent 1-2 newsletters without any links as well and still the newsletter ended up in promotions.

I have asked my subscribers to move my email to their primary inbox, but I cannot just depend on this, right?

Does anyone have a solution?

Software I use is Mailerlite but I have tried Substack as well and that's the same too.

text: I subscribe to a ton of newsletters and not a single one goes to the primary inbox unless I put it there. Not sure this is a solvable problem.

text: I'm trying to reach this company for a partnership <https://www.linkedin.com/company/brilliant-org/> I think they have a great product and I'm interested in co-creating a psychology course on their platform. I already have the enthusiastic yes of a respected psychologist connection of mine. I emailed a few people at the company but haven't heard back from them. If there's anyone here who has connections to them, I'd really appreciate your help.
